price: Enyi mlio amini! Kwa nini mnasema msiyo yatenda?
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لِمَ تَقُولُونَ مَا لَا تَفۡعَلُونَ
footnotes: Enyi mlio amini! Kwa ajili ya nini mnasema kwa ndimi zenu yasiyo hakikishwa na vitendo vyenu?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lima taqūlūna mā lā tafʿalūna
